task.title: Execute a Dataset
task.shortdesc: View the list of defined datasets on the Manage Datasets page.

prereq.note: Only users with a role of can execute a dataset.

context.p: To see what datasets are available:

step.cmd: Open the Manage Datasets page, by clicking the Datasets icon in the left navigation bar.

info.p: The Manage Datasets page opens, listing the defined datasets.

step.cmd: Check the checkbox next to the dataset you want to execute, or check Select/Deselect All to select all the datasets.
step.info: You will only be able to select datasets that the has designated as available to you in the dataset definition. Within that dataset, the data you are able to see will be constrained by the access policy applied to the dataset.
